name: Shinji Adventures: The Game
description:
Go Watch Anime House 5

This is a shoot-em up game based on RDC World's Anime House 5 Character (shoutout to all the Netflix animes tho, yall tryin lol)

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Shoot Spells

Arrow Keys - Move

Credits:

Opening/Ending: Toastymarshmellow & RDC World

In-Game Music: astroblk

Magic Circle: Taylor Richardson

Anime Characters: Charat Genesis / Charat Bigbang Programs

Sprites: hiddenone, Kadokawa, Avery, whtdragon

Dark World: Time Fantasy Assets
